Package cs350s22.support

Class Clock

java.lang.Object
cs350s22.support.Clock
public class Clock extends Object
Defines the singleton system clock.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates the clock.

      Advances the clock manually by one step. The clock must be inactive.

    • onestep

      public void onestep(int count)
      Advances the clock manually by an arbitrary number of steps. The clock must be inactive.
      Parameters:
